query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Multimedia AV documentary produced (Portugal)
result.description: Production of a multimedia AV documentary (MNA) In order to produce new knowledge, and to leave a legacy for future generations, it is considered that the production of a multimedia documentary will be of special interest. The documentary has the following goals: To present different community museums in EU and LAC; To show their environments (natural and cultural); To document testimonies from people in their communities; To record intangible heritage manifestations; To provide the opportunity to share intangible heritage from different parts of the world using the motto : “We are the world community”.

result.title: Development of a software application
result.description: Development of a software application, in a GIS environment, enabling the development of automatic mapping and the availability of an instrument for territorial analysis, the thematic maps.the design will be applied to the cultural heritage. UVEG will proceed to the elaboration of territorial databases (geo-referenced) and the application of the GIS to the territorial system of heritage. The territorial method of the heritage will be incorporated. The method of evaluation of the cultural heritage will be incorporated. It will develop a graphic symbology, iconography and symbolism adapted to the object of the cartographic representation, and the cultural heritage.

result.title: Travelling exhibition - Migration and Memory
result.description: Creation and circulation of travelling exhibition on Migration and Memory – installed in first LAC venue.a. Development of exhibition brief based on materials generated from 2 and 3 above; b. Recruitment and contracting of consultant curatorial services and exhibition designer; c. Commissioning of modular exhibition systems; d. Establishment of partnership/contract for transportation services; e. Scheduling of exhibition programme, deployment of exhibition and development of pedagogical materials.

result.title: Curating Migration and Diaspora exhibition
result.description: This component will collectively investigate the impact of migration and the resulting cultural diasporas on the field of contemporary visual art curatorship in particular. It will be underpinned by a consideration of the increasing prevalence of new media technologies both as a tool for communication, a mechanism for identity construction and as a medium for art. The exhibition will be co-curated between UWI and USTAN. The lead partner will construct both the briefs, the contracts, and will engage in the development of appropriate partnerships and programmes to give effect to their rationale.

result.title: Communication tools
result.description: D55 will consist of a report including a list of all the communication tools together with a short description and a link whenever relevant for access in electronic form or photos and other typed material in electronic form as appropriate For instance for videos it will include the web link to the video for posters it will include a link to the electronic form of the poster for MOOCs a web link for conferencesworkshops photos andor links to blogs etc

result.title: Technology Knowledge Base and Observatory
result.description: D13 Technology Knowledge Base and Observatory NCSRD M12D13 Identifies leading edge technologies ITS developments and success stories across Europe that will be consolidated in the initial project knowledge leading to the selection of technologies to be used and to be monitored Inventory structuring and publishing via the web portal of relevant information in a useful way transforming information into knowledge Lessons learned from the living labs will be added The Observatory will be part of the outputs to form part of the EuTravel Sustainability plan
